[[Sasuke]] attacks with his [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|sword]], stabs it into the ground, balances himself on it and kicks his opponent away. His kick is usually aimed at the upper abdomen until the neck area. 

== Trivia ==
* This move was only named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2]]''.
